title: CME Surpasses Binance: Bitcoin Futures Open Interest Flippening Unfolds
description: Binance has been dethroned by the Chicago Mercantile Exchange as the largest Bitcoin futures market. This milestone is considered important in the race for a spot Bitcoin ETF. Global derivatives marketplace, Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CME) has emerged as the new leader in Bitcoin futures open interest, surpassing the long-standing dominance of Binance.Â  This shift comes [...]
